text: The XVI Memorial of Hubert Jerzy Wagner was a volleyball tournament held at Tauron Arena in Kraków, Poland from 24 to 26 August 2018. Like the previous edition, 4 teams participated in the tournament, but first time in the history, it was the same teams second time in the row. ==Qualification== All teams except the host must have received an invitation from the organizers. {| class="wikitable" style="width:70%;" |- style="background:Lightgrey;" | style="width:20%; margin-top: 2em; margin-left: a8uto; margin-right: auto" | Piotr Nowakowski, Dawid Konarski, Bartosz Kurek, Artur Szalpuk, Damian Schulz, Damian Wojtaszek, Fabian Drzyzga, Grzegorz Łomacz, Michał Kubiak (), Aleksander Śliwka, Jakub Kochanowski, Paweł Zatorski, Bartosz Kwolek, Mateusz Bieniek |- |Head Coach |- | Vital Heynen |} ==Awards== *Most Valuable Player : Artur Szalpuk *Best Setter : Jay Blankenau *Best Server : Piotr Nowakowski *Best Receiver : Dmitry Volkov *Best Blocker : Jakub Kochanowski *Best Opposite Spiker : Jean Patry *Best Libero : Jenia Grebennikov ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:Memorial of Hubert Jerzy Wagner Category:Sports competitions in Kraków Memorial of Hubert Jerzy Wagner Memorial of Hubert Jerzy Wagner Memorial of Hubert Jerzy Wagner Category:21st century in Kraków
